EEG_correct_quiz_questions.Description: participant's score on yes/no questionnaire concerning contents of story during EEG data acquisition, with 5 questions following each of the 4 sections of the audio book

fMRI_correct_quiz_questions.Description: participant's score on yes/no questionnaire concerning contents of story during fMRI data acquisition, with 5 questions following each of the 4 sections of the audio book

total_quiz_questions.Description: the total number of yes/no quiz questions the participant was asked

EEG_accuracy_quiz_questions.Description: participant's accuracy rate on yes/no questionnaire concerning contents of story during EEG data acquisition

fMRI_accuracy_quiz_questions.Description: participant's accuracy rate on yes/no questionnaire concerning contents of story during fMRI data acquisition

scan_run1.Description: scan numbers of fMRI first run

scan_run2.Description: scan numbers of fMRI second run

scan_run3.Description: scan numbers of fMRI third run

scan_run4.Description: scan numbers of fMRI forth run

L.L.GenQ4c.Description: How often do you take part in sports or activities that are mildly energetic, moderately energetic or vigorous. Vigorous: e.g. running, hard swimming, tennis, squash, digging, cycle racing.

L.L.GenQ5.Description: How often do you read (material of any sort) for more than 20 minutes?

L.L.GenQ6.Description: How often do you practice speaking, reading, writing or learning a second language?
